Name: IronCommando/钢铁突击队
About the game: new version info version 1.2.0: 1 add new character 'ninjia' 2. Add local 2 player mode 3 add local 1 player control 2 role mode ------------------------------------------------- New character: ninjia. Use knives and darts to attack, and can use special skills: Separation In the STG mode, the game integrates the elements of 'build' and strengthens itself through the rewards collected in the level. You can not only improve your ability permanently, but also buy consumption props and renewal opportunities. The store is the key to success. powerful enemy leader A wonderful plot is inseparable from the powerful enemy, who defeats the leader of the enemy and uncovers the plot behind step by step. In addition to large-scale mechanical boss, the game also designed a lot of human type boss; for the sake of world peace, we must defeat them! different characters have different ways of playing, and each character has a different experience. Different weapons - machine guns, pistols, shotguns, missiles, proliferation bombs and so on Different abilities - roll, sprint, extra weapons, etc Different intensities - different basic abilities, good at firearms, melee, evasion. Defense, different tendencies of explosives Combined with operating habits, choose your favorite role! support system You only have one chance to pass. All resources should be obtained during the game, including the chance to continue. But it doesn't matter. With each pass, you can get a certain 'points' reward. With 'points', you can buy powerful support capabilities, such as increasing the number of default renewal, unlimited ammunition weapons, etc.
